skills.name: S—S—S—Scared
skills.desc: The Treasure Trotter got spooked and will flee in 2 turns.

skills.name: Run... Run!
skills.desc: The Treasure Trotter is panicking and will flee in 1 turn.

skills.name: Phew... Escaped
skills.desc: The Trotter flees in an instant.

skills.name: P—Protect You
skills.desc: When entering battle, applies "P—Protect You" to all friendly units. Each stack of "P—Protect You" can nullify all DMG received from 1 incoming hit except for DoT. "P—Protect You" stacks are shared across the team.
